title: Swinging For The Fences
description:
During Domonique Foxworth’s PTI debut, he and Pablo Torre discuss if Aaron Donald should be suspended for swinging a helmet during a fight at practice with the Bengals, their thoughts on the allegations that have surfaced against Bill’s punter Matt Araiza and if they are on Manfred or Carew’s side on the future of baseball. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Tony Kornheiser, Michael Wilbon
itunes:subtitle: PTI: Araiza's allegations come to light and should Aaron Donald be punished for swinging a helmet?
